announcements.author: Bobby Canteen
announcements.title: Weather Warning
announcements.content: It is going to be beautiful so WATCH OUT!

announcements.author: Sara Lee
announcements.title: Note About Cleaning
announcements.content: Be sure to specify the proper cleaning procedures in your rental ad so tenants know what to do.

announcements.author: Burrito Brad
announcements.title: Leftover Food
announcements.content: It would be helpful if everybody would leave fresh burritos in the fridge upon departure. I will collect them at the end of each stay. Thank you for your attention to this message.
